articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Siraj will bowl much worse and…': Gambhir 'disappointed' with India pacer - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir looked back at India's bowling after South Africa won the 2nd T20I by five wickets (DLS). | Cricket
articles.content: Team India received the rough end of the stick Tuesday evening against South Africa as their bowlers struggled to grip the wet ball in the 2nd T20I at St George's Park, Gqeberha. Defending a revised … [+2558 chars]
